thread.title: Ivanka Trump causes stir by sitting at the president's desk
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump causes stir by sitting at the president's desk | Washington Examiner

author: Anna Giaritelli
title: Ivanka Trump causes stir by sitting at the president's desk
text:
Not everyone is happy about Ivanka Trump getting "a seat at the table" after the first daughter posted a photo of herself on social media sitting at the Oval Office desk while her father and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau stood at her side.
"A great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table!" the 35-year-old businesswoman-turned-adviser to Trump wrote in posts on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.
A great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table! pic.twitter.com/AtiSiOoho0 — Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 13, 2017 
A day earlier, Trudeau and Trump announced the Canada-United States Council for Advancement of Women Entrepreneurs and Business Leaders, a bilateral initiative to increase women entrepreneurship in both nations. The meeting was arranged by Ivanka Trump, who has been the leading voice for more moderate to progressive concerns among White House advisers.

Ivanka wants more women at the table, but oh, feminists think it should be a different type of womenFuck off feminist, fucking hypocrites— Political Penguin (@PenguinAndSuit) February 14, 2017 
I hope AG Yates sat at a big table across from DJ T, JR, and Ivanka and @POTUS said "You're fired" #silverlining — Sean C (@scronin215) January 31, 2017 
TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Nordstrom and now Burlington Coats all drop Ivanka Trump styles. Coming soon: the Ivanka table at Dollar General...— Joe Conason (@JoeConason) February 13, 2017 
This round table Women CEO crap was nothing more than Trump using Trudeau's image to try and repair Ivanka's brand. That's it. That's all.— Laura (@LauraE303B) February 13, 2017 
Last week, the eldest daughter to the president posted a photo of her on the phone while holding her youngest child. The post elicited praise from those who liked her simultaneously being both a mother and career woman, while others criticized her actions.
Also   House Republicans resist calls for independent commission on Russian meddling Democrats are calling to create an independent commission to investigate Russian meddling in U.S. affairs.
By Nicole Duran • 02/14/17 4:27 PM Taking a call in the White House with my personal assistant Theodore. A post shared by Ivanka Trump (@ivankatrump) on Feb 7, 2017 at 2:32pm PST Top Story Gallup poll: Americans see Trump as strong leader who keeps promises President   trustworthy."
By Emily Jashinsky • 02/14/17 12:15
